name: officedev-microsoft-teams-samples-msgext-expert-finder-js
title: Expert Finder with SSO in Copilot using multi parameter search
shortDescription: This sample implements a Teams message extension for Copilot, enabling users to query a database of candidates based on skills, location, and availability.
longDescription: This application showcases a Teams message extension that works within Microsoft Copilot, allowing users to search for experts by multiple parameters such as skills, location, and availability. It also supports Single Sign-On (SSO) for seamless user authentication.

thumbnails.alt: Solution UX showing microsoft teams nodejs msgext-expert-finder-js sample
